InstallationÂ¶

Run the following command:

$ pip install pyrotor

Or from the source:

$ git clone https://github.com/bguedj/pyrotor
$ pip install pyrotor/.

Or without using pip:

$ git clone https://github.com/bguedj/pyrotor
$ python pyrotor/setup.py install
